
Intercepted: Dr. Blum encrypted his secret with RSA using a special modulus. Analysts believe it’s vulnerable. Can you reveal the message? ## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{90z7xtgd}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 2350228501125886457419246416414567171353808956151282059454242659775363419164973092358072106577404501245758939237477992098279558737093729527604814626651586
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=8163672860646081414053857025928029371852754976656519847778982106149938157235960570161105641808248734812089403139549036854851064133647407279642218836318657, e=4671356927909670994343982099017295051960408163956091748294645312991758246417353197033207529134267896411441990893992496916340949400763086233953554257463893
The lower 104 bits of p are: 33254993198773727948096611595237529883

extra_info: p=90268326106126481388828188018133310676618894615352750550221155958867886151963, q=90437844732472729894286025401548906854031403221493172383504761119294132486739, φ(n)=8163672860646081414053857025928029371852754976656519847778982106149938157235779863990267042596965620598669720922018386557014218210713681362564056817679956
